targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(*) as Windows

  FROM [OperationsManager].[dbo].[MTV_Computer]

SELECT count(*) as Nodes
FROM [OperationsManager].[dbo].[MTV_System$NetworkManagement$Node]

SELECT count(*) as Unix

  FROM [OperationsManager].[dbo].[MTV_Microsoft$Unix$Computer]

SELECT count(*) as Severe
  FROM [OperationsManager].[dbo].[AlertView]
  WHere [TimeResolved] is null and Severity = 0

SELECT count(*) as Warning
  FROM [OperationsManager].[dbo].[AlertView]
  WHere [TimeResolved] is null and Severity = 1

SELECT count(*) as Info
  FROM [OperationsManager].[dbo].[AlertView]
  WHere [TimeResolved] is null and Severity = 2

SELECT count(*) as metric
  FROM [lansweeperdb].[scorch].[SCOM]

SELECT
  $__timeEpoch([TimeRaised]),
  count(*) as value
  
FROM
  [OperationsManager].[dbo].[AlertView]
WHERE
  $__timeFilter([TimeRaised]) and [AlertStringName] like 'MSSQL on Windows: Log Backup Failed to Complete' and [ResolutionState] = 0
  Group By [AlertStringName], [TimeRaised]
ORDER BY
  TimeRaised DESC

SELECT
  $__timeEpoch([TimeRaised]),
  count(*) as value
  
FROM
  [OperationsManager].[dbo].[AlertView]
WHERE
  $__timeFilter([TimeRaised]) and [AlertStringName] like 'MSSQL on Windows: Database log file is full. Back up the transaction log for the database to free up some log space' and [ResolutionState] = 0
  Group By [AlertStringName], [TimeRaised]
ORDER BY
  TimeRaised DESC

SELECT
  $__timeEpoch([TimeRaised]),
  count(*) as value
  
FROM
  [OperationsManager].[dbo].[AlertView]
WHERE
  $__timeFilter([TimeRaised]) and [AlertStringName] like 'Failed to Connect to Computer' and [ResolutionState] = 0
  Group By [AlertStringName], [TimeRaised]
ORDER BY
  TimeRaised DESC

SELECT
  $__timeEpoch([TimeRaised]),
  count(*) as value
  
FROM
  [OperationsManager].[dbo].[AlertView]
WHERE
  $__timeFilter([TimeRaised]) and [AlertStringName] like 'Network Device is Not Responding' and [ResolutionState] = 0
  Group By [AlertStringName], [TimeRaised]
ORDER BY
  TimeRaised DESC

SELECT
  $__timeEpoch([TimeRaised]),
  count(*) as value
  
FROM
  [OperationsManager].[dbo].[AlertView]
WHERE
  $__timeFilter([TimeRaised]) and [AlertStringName] like 'Logical Disk Free Space is low' and [ResolutionState] = 0
  Group By [AlertStringName], [TimeRaised]
ORDER BY
  TimeRaised DESC

/****** Script for SelectTopNRows command from SSMS  ******/
SELECT count([IsInMaintenanceMode])
  FROM [OperationsManager].[dbo].[MaintenanceMode] as MM
  inner join [OperationsManager].[dbo].[MTV_Microsoft$Windows$OperatingSystem] on [OperationsManager].[dbo].[MTV_Microsoft$Windows$OperatingSystem].BaseManagedEntityId = MM.[BaseManagedEntityId]
  where [IsInMaintenanceMode] = 1

SELECT   
 vPerf.DateTime,  
 vPerf.AverageValue,  
 vPerf.MinValue,  
 vPerf.MaxValue,  
 vPerformanceRuleInstance.InstanceName,   
 vManagedEntity.Path,   
 vPerformanceRule.ObjectName,   
  vPerformanceRule.CounterName  
 FROM OperationsManagerDW.Perf.vPerfHourly AS vPerf INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance ON OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId = vPerf.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vManagedEntity ON vPerf.ManagedEntityRowId = OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vManagedEntity.ManagedEntityRowId INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule ON OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance.RuleRowId = OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.RuleRowId   
 WHERE   
 (OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.ObjectName like '%disk%')  
 --AND OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.CounterName like '%sec/T%'  
 AND vManagedEntity.Path like '%-DC02%'  
 and vPerf.DateTime > getdate()-30
 Order by [DateTime] desc

SELECT TOP 20 SUM(RepeatCount+1) AS RepeatCount, AlertStringName, AlertStringDescription, Name   
 FROM Alertview WITH (NOLOCK)   
 WHERE Timeraised is not NULL   
 GROUP BY AlertStringName, AlertStringDescription, MonitoringRuleId, Name   
 ORDER BY RepeatCount DESC

panels.title: Top 20 Alerts in an Operational Database, by Repeat Count

targets.rawSql:
SELECT top 50 EventDisplayNumber, COUNT(*) AS TotalEvents   
 FROM OperationsManagerDW.Event.vEvent   
 GROUP BY EventDisplayNumber   
 ORDER BY TotalEvents DESC

panels.title: Most Common Events by event number

panels.description: 'No data to show' is good! It means there are no unresponsive servers!

targets.rawSql:
SELECT bme.DisplayName,s.LastModified as LastModifiedUTC, dateadd(hh,-5,s.LastModified) as 'LastModifiedCST (GMT-5)'   
 FROM state AS s, BaseManagedEntity AS bme   
 WHERE s.basemanagedentityid = bme.basemanagedentityid   
 AND s.monitorid   
 IN (SELECT MonitorId FROM Monitor WHERE MonitorName = 'Microsoft.SystemCenter.HealthService.ComputerDown')   
 AND s.Healthstate = '3' AND bme.IsDeleted = '0'   
 ORDER BY s.Lastmodified DESC

panels.title: Health Service Down

targets.rawSql:
SELECT TOP 20 SUM(1) AS AlertCount, AlertStringName, AlertStringDescription, Name   
 FROM Alertview WITH (NOLOCK)   
 WHERE TimeRaised is not NULL   
 GROUP BY AlertStringName, AlertStringDescription, MonitoringRuleId, Name   
 ORDER BY AlertCount DESC

panels.title: Top 20 Alerts in an Operational Database, by Alert Count

targets.rawSql:
SELECT mp.MPName, r.RuleCategory, COUNT(*) As RulesPerMPPerCategory   
 FROM Rules r   
 INNER JOIN ManagementPack mp ON mp.ManagementPackID = r.ManagementPackID   
 GROUP BY mp.MPName, r.RuleCategory   
 ORDER BY RulesPerMPPerCategory DESC

SELECT   
 vPerf.DateTime as time,
 vPerformanceRuleInstance.InstanceName,
 vPerf.AverageValue
 FROM OperationsManagerDW.Perf.vPerfHourly AS vPerf INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance ON OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId = vPerf.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vManagedEntity ON vPerf.ManagedEntityRowId = OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vManagedEntity.ManagedEntityRowId INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule ON OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance.RuleRowId = OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.RuleRowId   
 WHERE   
 (OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.ObjectName like '%disk%')  
 AND OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.CounterName like '% Free Space'  
 AND vManagedEntity.Path like '%SCOM%'
 and vPerf.DateTime > getdate()-30
 Order by datetime

select distinct top 50 count(sce.StateId) as NumStateChanges,   
 m.DisplayName as MonitorDisplayName,   
 m.Name as MonitorIdName,   
 mt.typename AS TargetClass   
 from StateChangeEvent sce with (nolock)   
 join state s with (nolock) on sce.StateId = s.StateId   
 join monitorview m with (nolock) on s.MonitorId = m.Id   
 join managedtype mt with (nolock) on m.TargetMonitoringClassId = mt.ManagedTypeId   
 where m.IsUnitMonitor = 1   
  -- Scoped to within last 7 days   
 AND sce.TimeGenerated > dateadd(dd,-7,getutcdate())   
 group by m.DisplayName, m.Name,mt.typename   
 order by NumStateChanges desc

panels.title: Noisiest monitors changing state in the database in the last 7 days.
